issue.title: [C++][Compute][Dataset] Extract subtree pruning logic to compute::
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12891](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12891). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Subtree pruning need not reference fragments or anything else in dataset::, so it should be extracted to the compute namespace and be unit tested alongside Expression

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12891?focusedCommentId=17375963) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10484
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10484>
